mapper.select: select qa.id, qa.quiz_id, qa.user_id, qa.content, qa.like_number, qa.is_check, qa.create_time, qa.update_time, u.avatar, u.nickname, q.title from d_quiz_answer qa left join u_user u on u.id = qa.user_id left join d_quiz q on q.id = qa.quiz_id where qa.id = #{id}

select qa.id, qa.quiz_id, qa.user_id, qa.like_number, qa.content, qa.create_time, qa.update_time, u.avatar, u.nickname from d_quiz_answer qa left join u_user u on u.id = qa.user_id where qa.is_check = 1 and qa.quiz_id = #{quizId}
